name: Standard Chartered Private Equity
overview: Standard Chartered Private Equity is a private equity and venture capital arm of Standard Chartered Bank specializing in mid to late stage companies. It invests in expansion capital and acquisitions or management buyouts. The firm makes investments across a range of industries. It targets investments in companies whose principal operations and management are located in Greater China, Korea, South East Asia, or India. The firm typically, invests between $10 million and over $50 million in a single transaction, with a preference for deals of greater than $25 million. It prefers to acquire a board seat in its portfolio companies. The firm generally exits within a five year period. It also helps in IPO preparation. Standard Chartered Private Equity is based in Singapore with additional offices in Beijing, China; India; and Central, Hong Kong.
